p: Patients received two to seven cycles of induction therapy before stem cell mobilization. Induction therapy was applied according to the local protocol of our center and referring institutions. Peripheral hematopoietic progenitor cells were mobilized with cyclophosphamide (4 g/m 2) and granulocyte colony-stimulating factor (G-CSF) 10 mcg/kg twice a day or G-CSF alone if patients had less than complete response or complete response after induction therapy, respectively.
